abstract: A judge in Delaware’s Court of Chancery approved a settlement Friday by Yahoo that makes changes in its severance plan that investors contend would make it easier for Microsoft and other potential suitors to buy the Internet search company.
lead_paragraph: A judge in Delaware’s Court of Chancery approved a settlement Friday by Yahoo that makes changes in its severance plan that investors contend would make it easier for Microsoft and other potential suitors to buy the Internet search company.

headline.main: Judge Approves Yahoo Accord on Microsoft Bid
